Header: Customs arrest a suspect with Yen 5 mn at BIA
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Sri Lanka Customs arrested a 38-year-old person who attempted to illegally carry  Japan Yen 5 mn to Japan. Sri Lanka Customs spokesperson, Sunil Jayaratna noted that when it is converted it exceeds Rs 8.1 mn. Further investigations are underway.
